meanings.sent1: The pearlitic structure of the metal made it strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The sword had a pearlitic shine to it, reflecting the light beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The pearlitic nature of the cake made it look like a delicious work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her pearlitic personality shone through, always calm and composed.
meanings.sent5: The pearlitic glow of the stars lit up the night sky.
